title: [Monastery, Masters' Bridge]
description: Leaves drift effortlessly about on a disturbingly cool breeze that travels across and under the bridge.  Long hemp cords bind the swaying bridge to tree branches high up in the canopy, and slender glass globes are tied to the rope hand railings.  The sound of rushing water filters across the path from a cliff that can be seen in the distance, while white cobblestones gleam in the sunlight from the courtyard that the bridge empties into at its other end.
